hero.subtitle: Create from Text or Images Free
hero.description: Create printable coloring pages from text prompts or photos by using our free AI tool. Kid-friendly, instant, and perfect for parents, teachers, and creators.

features.title: Two Fun Ways to Make Your Own Coloring Pages

textToImage.title: Text to Coloring Page
textToImage.description: Just type in a short description — like "a dinosaur playing the drums" — and watch it turn into a printable coloring page within seconds.

imageToColoring.title: Image to Coloring Page
imageToColoring.description: Upload any photo or sketch — of your pet, a cartoon, or even a selfie — and turn it into clean black-and-white line art ready to print and color.

gallery.title: See the Magic for Yourself
gallery.description: Check out some sample coloring pages made from real text prompts and uploaded images. From whimsical animals to custom portraits, let your imagination take the lead.

step1.title: Type a Prompt or Upload an Image
step1.description: Describe your idea or upload a photo to start creating.

step2.title: Click the "Generate" Button
step2.description: Let our AI turn your input into a black-and-white coloring page.

step3.title: Download and Print Instantly
step3.description: Save your page and start coloring anytime, anywhere.

user1.name: Emily
user1.content: This tool is like magic for my 6-year-old. She just types in 'unicorn on a skateboard' and it turns into a printable coloring page instantly. We've made a whole binder full of her ideas!

user2.name: Brian
user2.content: I use it every week in my elementary art class. The kids love seeing their wild ideas turned into something they can color. It saves me hours of prep time!

user3.name: Lauren
user3.content: As a therapist, I often incorporate creative tools into sessions. This has been a wonderful, low-pressure way for kids to express themselves visually.

user4.name: Marcus
user4.content: I uploaded an old photo of my dog and turned it into a coloring page — then I colored it with my daughter. It's now hanging on our fridge!

user5.name: Tara
user5.content: I'm a digital artist and I actually use this to generate quick outline inspiration when I'm sketching new characters. It's surprisingly clean and usable.

user6.name: Kelly
user6.content: I run a summer camp and we used this to create custom coloring books for each camper — with their names and favorite animals. Huge hit!

user7.name: David
user7.content: I never thought I'd enjoy coloring as an adult, but this tool makes it feel personal. I typed in 'peaceful forest with a cat' and spent the evening relaxing while coloring it in.

user8.name: Jenny
user8.content: What I love most is that I don't need to install anything. I used it on my tablet, created a coloring page of my son's drawing, and printed it in two minutes. So convenient!

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Flexible pricing to meet different needs

cta.title: Ready To Create Your First Coloring Page?
cta.description: No drawing needed—just ideas! Perfect for parents, teachers, and creators who want to make coloring fun, personal, and screen-free.

question1.q: Is this tool free to use?
question1.a: Yes! Our AI coloring pages generator is completely free. You can create and download as many pages as you like, with no hidden costs or subscriptions.

question2.a: Absolutely. The tool is ad-free, simple to use, and designed with families and educators in mind. Kids can safely explore their creativity on any device.

question3.q: What types of images work best for image-to-coloring pages?
question3.a: Clear photos, doodles, scanned sketches, or line drawings all work well. For best results, use images with good contrast and minimal background clutter.

question4.q: Can I use the coloring pages for commercial projects?
question4.a: You're welcome to use the pages for personal and educational purposes. For any commercial use (such as products, books, or merchandise), please refer to our licensing terms.

question5.q: Do I need to install anything?
question5.a: No installation required! The AI coloring book generator runs entirely in your browser—just open the site, start creating, and print right away.

question6.q: How is this different from traditional coloring books?
question6.a: Unlike traditional books, every page here is custom-made by you or your child — using text or photos — so every design is unique, personal, and fun.
